name: Ultima Underworld: The Stygian Abyss
notes:
- Recent GOG installer required (v2 or above)
- Fixed music not playing
- Keyboard layout image included in the game's folder.

files.game: N/A:Select the Windows installer for Ultima Underworld 1 and 2 provided by GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Windows installer for Ultima Underworld 1 and 2 provided by
    GOG
- innoextract: https://lutris.net/files/tools/innoextract-1.7-pre-x86_64.tar.gz
- conf: https://lutris.net/files/games/ultima-underworld-the-stygian-abyss/uuw1_conf.zip
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/uw/dosboxULTIMA1.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/innoextract
    file: innoextract
- execute:
    args: --extract $game --output-dir $CACHE/uw
    file: $CACHE/innoextract/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/uw
    src: $CACHE/uw/app
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/uw
    file: $conf
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $GAMEDIR/uw/game.gog
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/uw/dosboxULTIMA1.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: opengl
main_file: $GAMEDIR/uw/dosboxULTIMA1_single.conf
